alert.note: Alert for Clay; Quitman; Randolph; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 5:15PM EST until January 12 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Clay County in southwestern Georgia... Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Quitman County in southwestern Georgia... Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 600 PM EST. * At 515 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Cuthbert, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dawson, Cuthbert, Shellman, Sasser, Bronwood, Parrott, Crossroads, Pecan, Randolph Co A/p, Dawson Municipal A/P, Chambliss, Olivers Mill, Hatcher, Morris, Jones Crossing, Martins Crossroads, Bethel, Benevolence, Springvale and Cotton Hill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for southwestern Georgia.
